title: Add new circular HND badge logo asset and use it for header + favicon

requirements.summary: Add new generated circular badge logo + favicon image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ matching the specified chef + HND design.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with transparent backgrounds and crisp edges at 1:1 zoom: `hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` and `hnd-favicon-badge-chef.dim_64x64.png`.

The logo visually matches the specified layout: red circular border + white inner circle, chef character holding a pizza tray with chef hat + scarf, smiling, and “HND” text beneath in bold rounded styling using red + green.
No watermarking, no additional text besides “HND”, and no visible blur/pixelation artifacts.

file_operations.description: Add the new high-resolution, vector-style (rasterized PNG) circular badge logo asset with transparent background that matches the provided design spec (red outer ring, white inner circle, smiling cartoon chef holding pizza tray with chef hat + scarf, bold rounded “HND” in red + green). Keep changes limited to static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/.

Add the simplified favicon PNG (64x64) matching the same badge mark (chef + “HND”), readable at small size, transparent background, crisp edges, no watermark/blur/extra text. Keep as a static file under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (do not serve from backend).

requirements.summary: Replace existing logo references in the header and hero to use the new HND badge logo asset while continuing to render via SafeImage with appropriate English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` hero logo uses `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` as the logo `src`.
Logo images still render via the existing `SafeImage` component and retain appropriate `alt` text in English.

file_operations.description: Update the existing header logo `SafeImage` to use `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` as `src`, replacing `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-restaurant-transparent.dim_512x512.png`. Preserve existing `SafeImage` usage, fallback behavior, and English alt text. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

Update the hero logo `SafeImage` to use `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` as `src`, replacing `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-restaurant-transparent.dim_512x512.png`. Keep all other hero content/sections unchanged and continue using `SafeImage` with appropriate English alt text.

requirements.summary: Configure the favicon in frontend/index.html to use the new generated HND badge favicon asset.
acceptanceCriteria: When running the app in a browser, the tab favicon displays the new HND badge logo.

file_operations.description: Add/ensure a favicon `<link rel="icon" type="image/png">` in the `<head>` pointing to `/assets/generated/hnd-favicon-badge-chef.dim_64x64.png`. Keep changes limited to favicon linkage only (no unrelated head/content changes).
